title: Re: A quessing game, for a nitemare 3d track
content: Sounds synthesized. But, I'm not an expert on guitars or anything, so I wouldn't know. (Every other instrument sounds sythesized, as well, so I'd assume the guitar is)-Genius314

title: Re: A quessing game, for a nitemare 3d track
content:
Synthesized. One hell of a VST though. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________

Even though I am an ordinary man.

title: Re: A quessing game, for a nitemare 3d track
content:
ok. i just have to stop it before it ganna be a big mistake.
Synthsized means, its generated by Frequence modulation, or Amplipude modulation, or bouth ways, like AdLib tunes, is synthesized.

Just use the 2 options, Programmed, or By hand

title: Re: A quessing game, for a nitemare 3d track
content:
Well, it's probably now "programmed", either. I'll go with the term "VST'd". [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: A quessing game, for a nitemare 3d track
content:
i little shame on my self.
I whas thinking wrong about Synthesized. if i translate the word, its correct.
Everthing that is sampled on a keyboard or a computer, even the soundbank is 100GB or 10GB or whatever.
I whas just thinking of a Synth. beacuse its often called Synthesizer.

a apologize to all [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oops.gif[/img]
